content: Derrius, great post and thanks for your insights. I absolutely acknowledge white supremacy, privilege and blindness and have seen how it manifests itself in the workplace. What advice would you have for supportive white people who want to be allies, particularly those in positions of power within an organization, and even more specifically for governing boards? As a board member myself, I found myself wanting to know how that board member would have reacted to your command performance. Thanks.
